title: Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier, 1 gallon, Black; low tank indicator; Dish washer safe; Humidity capacity: 142ml/h; Aroma tray; 3 speeds; mechanical knob; covers 320 sq. ft. area, weight: 6.33 lbs
descriptions:
Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier, 1 Gallon, Black

Keep your indoor air comfortably balanced with the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier. Designed with an efficient evaporative cool mist system, this compact unit quietly adds refreshing moisture to rooms up to 320 sq ft—perfect for bedrooms, nurseries, home offices, and living areas.

Key features:
- 1-gallon tank: Provides ample runtime to help maintain consistent humidity throughout the day or night.
- Evaporative cool mist technology: Delivers a clean, comfortable mist without leaving white dust on surfaces.
- 3 speed settings: Customize output with an easy mechanical knob to find your ideal comfort level.
- 142 ml/hour humidity capacity: Steady performance for small to medium rooms.
- Aroma tray: Add your favorite essential oil to gently infuse the air with fragrance.
- Safety and convenience: Low water indicator and empty tank protection help prevent dry running.
- Easy to clean: Dishwasher-safe parts make maintenance simple.
- Compact and sturdy: Weighs 6.33 lbs and fits seamlessly into most spaces.
- Filter compatibility: Uses BestAir H62 replacement filters for optimal performance.

What’s in the box:
- Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier (Black)
- Aroma tray insert
- User guide

Specifications:
- Coverage area: Up to 320 sq ft
- Tank capacity: 1 gallon
- Mist type: Cool mist, evaporative
- Controls: Mechanical knob
- Speed settings: 3
- Dishwasher-safe components: Yes
- Low tank indicator: Yes
- Empty tank protection: Yes
- Compatible filter: BestAir H62
- Color: Black
- Weight: 6.33 lbs

Why you’ll love it:
This humidifier blends reliable moisture control with low-maintenance care. The evaporative system helps prevent over-humidifying and reduces mineral residue, while the dishwasher-safe parts and clear indicators make upkeep effortless. Add the aroma tray into the mix, and you get a simple, effective way to boost comfort and ambiance in your home.
